pr_title: Add max error retry config option to glue client

timeline.author: sopel39

replies.bodyText: Default is no retries.  I used 10 because that's the same default Presto sets for hive.s3.max-error-retries (which sets the same property on AWS's ClientConfiguration)
replies.author: vincentpoon

timeline.message: Add max error retry config option to glue client
